title: Shionogi Invests $2.1 Billion to Raise ViiV Healthcare Stake
description: Japanese pharmaceutical company Shionogi & Co. said it will invest $2.1 billion to raise its stake in ViiV Healthcare to 21.7%, making it an affiliate of the HIV drugmaker.
content: Japanese pharmaceutical company Shionogi & Co. said it will invest $2.1 billion to raise its stake in ViiV Healthcare to 21.7%, making it an affiliate of the HIV drugmaker.
